snippet.title: Patch Report #15.1 - New Vehicle: Mountain Bike, Weapon Balance, World Update | PUBG
snippet.description:
Battlegrounds Triathlon is a dream come true with Update 15.1's Mountain Bike! To learn about everything new, including the weapons rebalances, check out the latest Patch Report video or jump into the Live Servers!

Stay up to date with #PUBG :
👉Website: https://global.battlegrounds.pubg.com/
👉Twitter: https://twitter.com/pubg
👉Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pubg_battlegrounds_global
👉Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pubg.battlegrounds.global
